docs.snippet: The stakes will be high for Britain's historic role as a free-trading nation when it holds a referendum on whether to stay in the European Union on June 23....
docs.lead_paragraph: The stakes will be high for Britain's historic role as a free-trading nation when it holds a referendum on whether to stay in the European Union on June 23.

headline.main: Brexit and Britain-What Would It Mean for UK Trade?
headline.print_headline: Brexit and Britain-What Would It Mean for UK Trade?

docs.snippet: Britain's top share index end a four-day winning streak with a fall on Thursday, led lower by major mining stocks and hit by growing concern over the potential impact of Britain's exit from the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's top share index end a four-day winning streak with a fall on Thursday, led lower by major mining stocks and hit by growing concern over the potential impact of Britain's exit from the European Union.

headline.main: FTSE Falters as Mining Stocks,' Brexit' Fears Weigh
headline.print_headline: FTSE Falters as Mining Stocks,' Brexit' Fears Weigh

docs.snippet: The chief executive of one of the world's biggest firms Royal Dutch Shell warned on Sunday that the oil and gas company would be negatively impacted were Britons to back leaving the European Union in a referendum....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chief executive of one of the world's biggest firms Royal Dutch Shell warned on Sunday that the oil and gas company would be negatively impacted were Britons to back leaving the European Union in a referendum.

headline.main: Shell CEO Says Oil Giant Would Be Hit by Brexit
headline.print_headline: Shell CEO Says Oil Giant Would Be Hit by Brexit

docs.snippet: The European Union is seeking a fair deal that will provide a  way out of a complicated questions over the future of Britain's membership in the bloc, European Commission chief Jean-Claude Juncker said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union is seeking a fair deal that will provide a  way out of a complicated questions over the future of Britain's membership in the bloc, European Commission chief Jean-Claude Juncker said on Thursday.

headline.main: EU's Juncker Says Will Reach 'Fair Deal' to Avoid Brexit
headline.print_headline: EU's Juncker Says Will Reach 'Fair Deal' to Avoid Brexit

docs.snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron has privately conceded he may have to campaign for Britain to leave the European Union if he continues to be "completely ignored" by EU partners, The Daily Telegraph reported on Saturday....

headline.main: Cameron Says May Be Forced to Campaign for Brexit-Report

docs.snippet: A British exit from the European Union would be disastrous for the UK financial industry and could prompt companies to leave the country, the sector's main lobby group said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A British exit from the European Union would be disastrous for the UK financial industry and could prompt companies to leave the country, the sector's main lobby group said on Tuesday.

headline.main: 'Brexit' Would Be Disaster for UK Financial Sector-Industry Group
headline.print_headline: 'Brexit' Would Be Disaster for UK Financial Sector-Industry Group

docs.snippet: The European Union would be able to handle Britain exiting the bloc if it came to that, German Finance Minister Wolfgang Schaeuble said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union would be able to handle Britain exiting the bloc if it came to that, German Finance Minister Wolfgang Schaeuble said on Tuesday.

headline.main: German Finance Minister says EU Could Weather Brexit
headline.print_headline: German Finance Minister says EU Could Weather Brexit

docs.snippet: Facebook said it would expand its presence in Britain by 50 percent in 2017, joining other U.S. technology firms in increasing investment despite the uncertainty sparked by the country's vote to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Facebook said it would expand its presence in Britain by 50 percent in 2017, joining other U.S. technology firms in increasing investment despite the uncertainty sparked by the country's vote to leave the European Union.

headline.main: Facebook 'Likes' Britain's Talent, to Add Jobs Despite Brexit
headline.print_headline: Facebook 'Likes' Britain's Talent, to Add Jobs Despite Brexit

docs.snippet: British outsourcing services firm Mitie issued its second profit warning in two months on Monday, saying the uncertainty amongst its customers after Britain voted to leave the European Union had resulted in fewer new orders....
docs.lead_paragraph: British outsourcing services firm Mitie issued its second profit warning in two months on Monday, saying the uncertainty amongst its customers after Britain voted to leave the European Union had resulted in fewer new orders.

headline.main: Mitie Warns Again on Profits, Blaming Brexit Uncertainties
headline.print_headline: Mitie Warns Again on Profits, Blaming Brexit Uncertainties

docs.snippet: The British government said on Thursday it will appeal a decision by the High Court that requires it to gain parliamentary approval before triggering the process of exiting the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: The British government said on Thursday it will appeal a decision by the High Court that requires it to gain parliamentary approval before triggering the process of exiting the European Union.

headline.main: UK Government to Appeal Court Ruling on Triggering Brexit
headline.print_headline: UK Government to Appeal Court Ruling on Triggering Brexit
